title.text: Broad support for allowing voting by mail, automatic voting registration; mixed support for other proposals % who each of the following

values: Allowing any voter to vote by mail if they want to
Automatically registering all eligible citizens to vote
Removing people from registration lists if they haven't recently voted or confirmed their registration
